ios.subtitle: An app made just for kids

editorialNotes.short: Videos for kids to explore safely.

editorialNotes.standard: The long-awaited moment for Toca Boca fans has arrived. Toca Boca World, the newest edition to the popular series, brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful world. And this unique world keeps growing: The app continually updates with new areas to explore and characters to meet.
editorialNotes.short: Enrich your child’s imagination through creative world-building.

ios.subtitle: Fun Kids Game for Boys & Girls

editorialNotes.standard: The beloved Australian pups—Bluey, Bingo, Chilli, and Bandit—are all here in Bluey: Let’s Play! Featuring familiar characters and settings from the show, Bluey: Let’s Play! will have your little ones frolicking with garden gnomes, hunting for hidden long dogs, and more.
Lingokids sets kids up for success in school and beyond with thousands of activities that cleverly disguise education as entertainment.

editorialNotes.tagline: Cook up a storm in the kitchen
editorialNotes.standard: Food’s fun for everyone with Toca Boca’s second go-round in the kitchen. Choose different characters and try to please their palates by preparing fish, fruit, vegetables, and more. Deciding what to serve and whether to bake, boil, fry, chop, puree, or season it—or all of the above—will keep young chefs happily cooking away.

editorialNotes.short: Have fun with Barbie and friends! Play dress-up, decorate rooms and more.
Engage kids with the essential early curriculum in a fun way.

editorialNotes.standard: Khan Academy Kids teaches early literacy, language, math, and social and emotional skills throughout its more than 1,000 games, videos, and stories. The app integrates science lessons from National Geographic Young Explorer magazine, music from Super Simple Songs, and content from children’s nonfiction publisher Bellwether Media.
editorialNotes.short: Fun activities and lessons to instil skills in maths, phonics and more.

editorialNotes.standard: After experiencing this delightful addition to the series, we’re considering switching careers. From scissors to shavers to insta-grow tonic, we’re astounded by all the tools we can use on our adorably animated clients. After we’ve coiffed, dyed, and dressed them, we love showing off pics of their dramatic ’dos. Sometimes we even let the kids play! Sometimes.
editorialNotes.short: Become a style superstar by experimenting with different looks.

editorialNotes.standard: Pok Pok Playroom’s married founders set out to create a kids’ app parents wouldn’t have to mute in a restaurant—and to the delight of grown-up diners everywhere, they did it. Pok Pok Playroom is a free-play feast for little senses: There are switches to flip, gears to grind, and blobs to plop together, all drawn and designed by hand to make the app feel like a tactile, handcrafted toy. Endlessly inventive but never overwhelming, it’s a master class in how a simple app can sometimes feel the most advanced.

editorialNotes.short: Build mega tracks and play with your unlimited, awesome cars with friends.

editorialNotes.tagline: Discover the new menu and more

editorialNotes.short: An all-in-one app packed with stories, rhymes, songs and games.
Team up with Hello Kitty to make snacks and decorate cute lunch boxes!

editorialNotes.standard: Duolingo is one of the most successful language-learning apps in the world. Now with Duolingo ABC, kids ages 3 to 6 can get in on the fun with English reading activities. Packed with games and engaging exercises, Duolingo ABC applies the same tried and true methods that make Duolingo so popular—only with a lot more cute monkeys.

editorialNotes.short: All your favourite characters are together in one universe.

editorialNotes.standard: Kids will love the vast library of original content in Epic, from its growing list of books for all ages to its high-quality collection of educational videos. With stories from favorites like Sesame Street and Clifford, there’s always a reason to drop everything and read.
editorialNotes.short: Read from hundreds of kids’ titles that are sure to spark wonder and laughter at every page turn.
Fun colouring tools to change up your favourite character’s looks.

editorialNotes.standard: Sago Mini World offers more than 20 games, which can be downloaded to play offline (perfect for long journeys). Featuring familiar characters from the Sago Mini franchise, Sago Mini World will have your little ones building robots, designing monsters, exploring space, and more.
editorialNotes.short: Go on fun-filled adventures with friendly characters all over the world.

ios.subtitle: Learn to read, count and code!

editorialNotes.standard: The Montessori education method was conceptualized at the start of the 20th century by an Italian pediatrician of the same name. The idea behind it is to offer children an education based on a sensory and kinetic way of learning. Montessori Preschool is based on this ideology and provides a variety of activities, which seek to guide children ages 3–7 as they embark on their first steps in the world of education.
editorialNotes.short: Check out the new soccer game and see how many penalty shots you can score!

editorialNotes.tagline: Fun ways to learn for kids
editorialNotes.standard: Teach young children early literacy skills using a comprehensive program full of interesting activities. Featuring everything from letter tutorials and short books to poems and folk songs, this expertly designed app will engage students with diverse learning styles. To help keep lessons fun and active, kids are prompted to draw pictures and record their thoughts, and they can even exchange virtual postcards with friends and family.
editorialNotes.short: Develop reading skills through stories, songs and other activities.
